intro.presentation: The Fabmob mobility tracker is an open-source solution for collecting, sharing and analysing personal mobility smartphoen tracking data.
intro.partner: The Fabrique de Mobilit√©s is currently working on this project with the help of the ADEME and want to develop a mobility tracking common.

personal.title: Personal
personal.diary: The phone app provides a personalized travel diary, with information about times, distances, trajectories and travel modes.
personal.metrics: You can also check the Dashboard to access your calorie consummation, your carbon footprint or your metrics.

code-privacy.title: Code and Privacy
code-privacy.visibility: The project is a fork of E-Mission which is available on GitHub under an open source BSD license. So you have a complete visibility into the data that we collect, the analysis that we perform on it, and the results that we display.

join-us.site: You want to test the app ? Contact us on our website.

slides.caption-survey: Targeted surveys can be send and see by your users.
slides.caption-diary: Your personal diary containing all your trips.
